702117f-a.text:
W:estchester Avenue, north side, east from a point midway between Castle Hill and Glebe Avenues. Westchester Avenue, upon which is the elevated structure of the I.R.T. subway, bends northward slightly beyond Glebe Avenue.
April 16, 1938
P. L. Sperr
702117f-a.folder: Westchester Avenue & Unionport Road, Bronx, NY

701926f-a.text:
1401 Unionport Road,west side, between Westchester and Olmstead
Aves. The view is in a northerly direction.
July 9, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
701926f-a.folder: Unionport Road & Westchester Avenue, Bronx, NY
